item.title: Hello World
item.description: So, i finally “bit the bullet” and started the blog. IÂ´ve been thinking about it for a long time, but personal life combined with work didnt let me with too much time for this, so I decided to just start it with a few “rules” for myself: Im going to write the posts “as i go” or as im working with something that i deem interesting enough or i want to remember.
